item.description:
What is Capoeira?
http://www.youtube.co...
Capoeira is one of the coolest, most demanding, and invigorating mix of Martial Arts, Dance and Music...
Overall, it is a great exercise for the body and the mind, as it is a complete body work out that also requires your mind to be fully present and alert.

The Mandingueiros School is celebrating its Annual Batizado, where the newcomers get the chance to obtain theirs first cord by "kissing" the floor, while the most advanced students have a chance to show their learnt skills.

Of course, this is all happening Brazilian Style, which means Party Time! People, Masters, Instructors, Apprentices, and Amateurs from different school traditions visit from all over, to celebrate for 4 days straight. The celebration open its door to the Public on Saturday, an intense day full of Dancing. Various demosntration of latin dances like Samba, Merengue, Salsa, Capoeira, etc. are on Menu from 3:00 until 8:00 pm.

Event Cost: $10

Come celebrate with us, and find out why so many people from all over the world are now loving this practice.

Vai com Deus
item.how_to_find_us: At the door first 30 mins. Inside after, Ask for my name at the door for tickets

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Capoeira Batizado
